Articles.Content:
Anyone got skype? I need a docking mentor.

Thanks
I don't do Skype, but can you do Twitch.tv? I can type pretty fast and would be willing to help on there.

There's several docking tutorials out there, some better than others, so don't stop searching if the one you've been watching isn't doing it for you. Took me a few tries to figure it out, but become acquainted with the docking mode and using your RCS. Using your main engine only for docking can prove to be quite challenging. Changing your view to CHASE will also help with orientation with your thrusters.
Is your problem with docking or rendezvous? Docking is pretty straightforward.

Both docking and rendezvous are covered by scott manley. He taught me. He can teach you.

I would recommend a mod called docking cam. it makes docking a little more realistic, plus you wont have to switch to docking mode, which I've always found to be rather useless. Best thing to do might be to rebind your RCS translation controls to your numpad. You can then control attitude with your left hand and your translation with your right easily without having to worry about keys that aren't lined up. I mean everyone can WASD but who can HNIJKL?

Edited June 22, 2013 by Cpt. Kipard
